text:
Watch your Credit Line......
Photo By		Brown Bros.

What is there about those good old days the old folks always refer to?

In those good old days when pop was courting mom, he would if he lived in the city where this photo was made tie himself to the livery stable and hire a sleigh and the horse, if it were in the winter time and take the lady of his choice out for a spin, in the cold biting air. He loved to see the pink get into her cheeks as the nipping winds bit them. Nowadays, the pink gets onto the cheeks by simply dabbing them with the favorite rouge. We prefer an enclosed car, with heater, radio when it comes.

Photo by
Brown Brothers
220 West 42nd Street
New York City
title: Transportation - Sleighs.
